About Me

BIO

I'm a Graphic Design student at the Metropolitan University of Belgrade with more than 6 years of experience with Photoshop and Illustrator. Efficient, quick and a perfectionist, I've been drawing digital art for games almost all my life and enjoy designing anything media-related, be it movie posters, ad campaigns, concept art, illustration, UI, etc.

I can deliver original, professional-quality photography for designs, or illustrate something completely new both digitally or traditionally.
In some scenarios, 3D modeling might be needed for a design or illustration project, in which case I can use Blender software to deliver quality renders quickly.

All of my designs, drawings or models are done on a powerful rig, ensuring nothing but top quality and quick completion.

PERSONAL

Apart from doing graphic design, I also heavily enjoy gaming, I've written several unpublished novels which have perfected my knowledge of the English language, I also have a healthy obsession with the gym. Much like any other designer, I enjoy photography and calligraphy.

I recently started a Game Development project where I lead around 10 of my colleagues, all working in tandem to create a video game under the name "The Forest Beckons". This project, though still a work-in-progress, has reignited the spark for illustration and asset design in me, as well as taught me several important skills, including - leadership, game design, Unity (software), texture and asset design, etc.

I have been DM-ing for a large D&D tabletop campaign almost as long as i've been drawing / doing design - an experience which has taught me many things, including teamwork, game balance, storytelling, narrative, illustration and design for tabletop, etc.
